Description:
Found - One Prime Location
This quality older style brick veneer residence is sited on a superb 920mÂ² block in Cobram's most highly sought after location, only a short walk to Murray River and Thompson's Beach. The open plan living area incorporates a generous kitchen/meals area opening into lounge. High ceilings and Murray Pine floors add to the overall appeal. Two generous bedrooms with BIR's, renovated bathroom and separate laundry and toilet. Climate is controlled by ducted gas heating and reverse cycle split system air conditioner. Carport, brick lock up garage and lovely well established back yard. A great opportunity for the first home buyer or investor. Inspect today.

Description:
Lovely Family Home with Space for the Van!
Three living areas, generous bedrooms, plenty of vehicle accommodation and a landscaped, low maintenance block combine to provide a great family home! The living areas flow beautifully from the front, carpeted lounge/dining room through to the tiled kitchen/meals/family room, and then to the separate rumpus/TV room with a sliding door to the outdoor entertaining area and rear yard. The open kitchen features a gas cook top, electric wall oven, dishwasher and a walk in pantry. The four bedrooms are all a good size, three with built in robes and main with ensuite and walk in robe. The home also features ducted gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum system, and a gas boost, solar hot water service. Wide, shady verandahs with ceiling fans provide a number of options for outdoor living and entertaining. External sun blinds. Double garage with extra space for the workshop, and direct access to both the house and read yard. Secure, undercover parking bay for the caravan or boat. Rainwater tanks. Terraced rear yard with garden shed, and plenty of room for a pool. Attractive, low maintenance surrounds with sprinkler system from a domestic bore.
Beautifully presented, this high quality, steel frame home in a quiet court location close to the Murray River is sure to impress. Arrange your inspection today!

Description:
Gorgeous views of bushland and garden surrounds
This three bedroom home sits proudly up on the corner of River Road and Scenic Drive overlooking the stunning bushland area and within a short stroll to the mighty Murray River. Bullnose verandah across the front of the home overlook the gorgeous garden surrounds. Step inside and you are greeted with the formal lounge/dining areas which sit in a large bay projection and features decorative cornices, ceiling roses and high ceilings. The family and meals rooms appreciate views of the bushland and are overlooked by the kitchen which comprise cooktop, oven and dishwasher. This area further opens onto the outdoor entertaining area which can be enjoyed all year round. The master bedroom with its bay window has an ensuite and walk in robe. Climate throughout the home is controlled by reverse cycle ducted heating/cooling. Externally there is an oversized garage which is approximately 6.8m x 8.5m and incorporates a workshop area to the rear. This home offers seamless views of its stunning gardens from most windows and will impress the most fastidious of buyers.

Description:
Great Starter Property
Perfect for either the first home buyer or investor, this two bedroom weatherboard home is awaiting a new owner. Featuring a neat kitchen with gas stove and plenty of cupboards, cosy lounge with gas heater and a new, cooling air conditioner, both bedrooms with built in robes, and a recently renovated bathroom. Set on a massive 1117 square metre block with side driveway, good shedding, and plenty of room to move. This block would also be suitable for unit development (STCA). Quiet court location.

Description:
Retirement Living
• Move right into this 3 bedroom Oasis home. One owner since new – there really isn't anything left to do.
• 3 generous size bedrooms, the master has its own ensuite, walk-in robe, and separate split system.
• Kitchen is also a great size, plenty of built in cupboards, dishwasher, gas cooktop and electrical oven. Living area is spaciously designed with beautiful bay windows
• Outside is immaculate – undercover area is fully insulated and lined, garden shed, veggie gardens, wheelchair access and 8 solar panels on the roof
• This is a great designed home, inspect today

Description:
In original condition but loved!
This three bedroom cream brick home is as solid as the day it was built! The lounge has gas heating and has double doors opening onto the meals and kitchen. The kitchen has electric stove and loads of cupboards. It then leads to a sunroom which has an abundance of natural light coming through the wall of windows. Two of the three bedrooms have built in robes and access the generous sized family bathroom. The laundry offers a second shower and double trough. Externally there is a good sized yard and single garage with two bonus rooms adjacent which could be utilised as a sewing or scrapbooking room or just for storage. This home has lots of flexibility in the design and will not disappoint.
Disclaimer: All information contained herein is gathered from sources we deem to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy and interested persons should rely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Superb New Home Site
Highly sought after Villa Court location, close to the Murray River and walking tracks. This elevated, sandy level block measures 800 square metres with a generous 19.64 metre frontage. Located in a very appealing area with a reserve at end of the court. The block has already been scraped and soil tested for new home. The perfect block to build your dream home.

Description:
Elevated Excellence
This modern and enticing home is sited on an elevated 998 square meter block in one of Cobram's most sought after locations, and only a short walk to the banks of the Murray River. This beautifully presented home offers a delightful floor plan and is full of quality appointments. Features a stunning kitchen, three living areas, four bedrooms plus study and a large alfresco area with a stainless steel outdoor kitchen/barbecue. House access from double garage, ducted heating and cooling throughout. Excellent 9 x 7 metre shed perfect for the handyman. Superbly presented, low maintenance surrounds complete this wonderful setting. A top quality home in a prime location.
Property Code: 2142
